amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Weapons Activities (submarine launched ballistic missile) by $13.072 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds in the Weapons Activities account by $13,072,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 243 (Roll no. 334).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 243 (Roll no. 334).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Polis.
